roleset.name: fade, fade; cause to be erroded
roleset.note: CORRODE-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from corrode.01-v)
CORROSION-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to corrode.01. Corrode.01 is a member of VN classes other_cos-45.4.and entity_specific_cos-45.5. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from corrosion.01-n)

example.name: All args
example.text: The wind have corroded the boulders into fascinating shapes.

example.name: what now?
example.text: The corrosion of the American spirit
